step1: Welcome to this little tutorial. Let's begin to see how to play this game.
step2: This is your team ! You begin with 2 characters. If they win battles, characters will level up and get stronger.
step3: This is the life points of your team : if it comes to 0, you fail the battle.
step4: This is the magic points of your team. You need them to use magic.
step5: When you get damaged, this bar will rise up. When it gets full, your next attack will be overkill !
step6: This is where the enemy will appears. To win the battle, you have to kill them before they do.
step7: Click here to fight enemies. That simple !
step8: During the battle, you can click as many times as you want on this button, enemies hp will decrease faster.
step9: If you think the enemy is too strong, you can also escape the battle.
step10: This is your magic ! Don't forget you need MP to use them. For example, you can use 'Restore' to cure your characters.
step11: This is the main menu. You can buy new items at the shop, handle your inventory, save your party, etc.
step12: Your are actually into this zone. There is a hidden boss in each zones. Find it and kill it to go next zone !
step13: Each time the game is updated, you can check the new features by clicking here.
step14: If you want to report a bug, or ask for features that can make this game more fun, go there.
step15: Well, that's all ! Thanks for your attention ! Good luck and have fun ;)
